nodes.text: ** First, I never made any allusion to 'scientists', but only to 'materialist/mechanist/positivist/darwinist/atheists'. Which is not all the same thing, although people like you, who can say 'scientists (materialists, etc.)' with a perfectly straight face, cannot be expected to realize that fact; and certainly not to accept it for the true statement that it is. Second, I came to my conclusion after reading the posts of hundreds of 'materialist/mechanist/positivist/darwinist/atheists',(most of them self-styled 'scientists'), on this and a dozen other atheism vs creationism bb's, over the course of the past ten years.
And can you show where 'materialist/mechanist/positivist/darwinist/atheists' ever said that humans were the only ones capable of altruism?
